long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ultimate AI Powered Content Assistantâ€“ A browser extension that offers bespoke solutions for all your content requirements. With this powerful tool, simply click on the icon and choose from a range of tailored prompts to meet your specific needs. What's more, you can submit a custom request and receive the very best suggestions, revisions, explanations, or compositions based on the context and prompt you select. With a guarantee of personalized and efficient outcomes, Content Assistant is the ideal tool to elevate your content composition and review efforts anywhere within the browser.

To enable the extension:
1. Pin the extension by clicking the "Extensions" icon and clicking the "Pin" icon next ton Content Assistant.
2. Once pinned, click the Content Assistant icon and sign up.
3. Once signed up, you should be logged in and ready to use Content Assistant. 

We recommend configuring the extension to suit your goals best by updating the settings according to your needs.
